availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Ramey Jones in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 6, 1834. Father of Pressley Jones, James R. Jones, Sally A. Jones, Martillus J. Jones, William T. Jones, and Ellen Frances Jones. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Trigg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 320A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 45.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz Precinct, p. 41A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994056, Trigg County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film 000321335, p. 50.
